full_summary:
**Notice of Award for Lawn Care Services at Cartier-Brébeuf National Historic Site**

**Notice  Number:** 5P300-22-0124-A

**Notice Date:** October 18, 2022

**Bid Closing Date:** November 17, 2022, 2:00 PM EDT

**Published by:** Parks Canada

**Notice Description:**

Parks Canada is soliciting bids for Lawn Care Services at the Cartier-Brébeuf National Historic Site (NHS). The selected contractor will provide lawn care services for an approximate area of 50,000 square meters, including all lawned areas. The services will include:

* Spring clean-up
* Lawn mowing and trimming
* Maintenance of paths and paved areas
* Trimming of lawn edges
* Lawn aeration
* Collection of dead leaves

The contractor must provide all necessary equipment.

**Contract Period:**

The period of the contract is from April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2025 inclusively.

**Optional Site Visit:**

A site visit is recommended on October 25, 2022, to visit the work site at 175 l’Espinay street, Québec, QC G1L 2H7. Bidders must confirm their attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend by October 24, 2022.

**Contact Information:**

Lorraine Fletcher, Contracting Authority
lorraine.fletcher@pc.gc.ca
343-585-4712

**Submission Requirements:**

Bids are to be submitted via email or fax. Faxes must be sent to 1-877-558-2349 and emails to soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca. The maximum email file size is 15 megabytes.

**Important Notes:**

* Parks Canada is not currently accepting bids via SAP Ariba.
* Bids received in-person or by courier will not be accepted.
* Enquiries regarding this solicitation must be submitted in writing and received no later than five (5) calendar days prior to the bid closing date.

**Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) Notice:**

This procurement is subject to the CFTA. A copy of the CFTA is available upon request.

**Base of Payment:**

The contract will be based on the rates and schedules outlined in the bid solicitation document.
